CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_for_collector AS SELECT p.surname, p.name, p.midname, p.birthdate, p.birthplace, CASE WHEN p.gender = 178 THEN 'М' ELSE 'Ж' END AS gender, d.series, d.number, d.docdate, d.docorg, c.creditsum, c.creditsumback, c.creditdatabeg, c.creditdataend, c.creditaccount, CASE WHEN c.creditsumdebt IS NULL THEN c.creditsum ELSE c.creditsumdebt END AS creditsumdebt, a.address_text, CASE WHEN a.issame = 1 THEN a.address_text ELSE a1.address_text END AS raddress_text, pc1.value AS mobilephone, CASE WHEN a.issame = 1 THEN pc2.value ELSE pc3.value END AS homephone, pc4.value AS workphone FROM peoplepersonal p JOIN document d ON p.peoplemain_id = d.peoplemain_id JOIN credit c ON p.peoplemain_id = c.peoplemain_id JOIN address a ON p.peoplemain_id = a.peoplemain_id LEFT JOIN address a1 ON p.peoplemain_id = a1.peoplemain_id AND a1.isactive = 1 AND a1.partners_id = 6 AND a1.addrtype = 176 JOIN peoplecontact pc1 ON p.peoplemain_id = pc1.peoplemain_id AND pc1.isactive = 1 AND pc1.contact_id = 171 LEFT JOIN peoplecontact pc2 ON p.peoplemain_id = pc2.peoplemain_id AND pc2.isactive = 1 AND pc2.contact_id = 172 LEFT JOIN peoplecontact pc3 ON p.peoplemain_id = pc3.peoplemain_id AND pc3.isactive = 1 AND pc3.contact_id = 251 LEFT JOIN peoplecontact pc4 ON p.peoplemain_id = pc4.peoplemain_id AND pc4.isactive = 1 AND pc4.contact_id = 180 WHERE p.isactive = 1 AND p.partners_id = 6 AND d.isactive = 1 AND d.partners_id = 6 AND c.isactive = 1 AND c.creditstatus_id = 162 AND a.isactive = 1 AND a.partners_id = 6 AND a.addrtype = 175;
ALTER TABLE v_for_collector OWNER TO sa;
